page.title: 14WOLVERLEY SURGERY
page.content: {Wolverley Surgery}has two doctors who work for one morning each in Wolverley and another morning in the neighbouring village of{Cookley}. The names of the doctors are {Dr.Adams}and{Dr.Hughes}. The Surgery also has an appointments secretary,a typist and a nurse.Because there is no chemist the drugs have to be ordered through a computer terminal and are delivered twice a day. Also on the Surgery team are a midwife,District Nurse,a second nurse a bathing nurse and a Health Visitor. The Surgery times are 8.30 a.m. to 12.00 and 4.30 p.m. to 5.30 p.m. The Surgery deals with a population of 2000 - 2500 people. Each doctor deals with 40-45 people per day.
